::WindRider::
WindRider was ashamed of himself. Ashamed that while a
lady bot was in danger all he could do was stand there
like a stupid drone.He offered Battera his hand.
"I-I'm sorry", he stammered. "I should have come to
your defense instead of doing nothing. Im a scientist
and an explorer,and Im not used to being in a combat
zone.I'm not built for war."
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She took a few pases back and had her back to the
> wall.  She stood 
> there with her head down and her wings wrapped
> around her.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > Being quite stunned at what he had just seen and
> > heard,he looked at Battera and then Primal Prime.
> He
> > was sure that his aural receptors must be
> > malfunctioning."Did I hear you correctly?", the
> bird
> > bot asked Primal Prime. "Did you just say you
> were...
> > Optimus Prime??"
> 
> 
>
